findings.title: Unprotected approve Function
findings.description: The approve function is declared as external and does not have any access modifiers, making it vulnerable to unauthorized access.

findings.title: Transfer
findings.description: The _beforeTokenTransfer function allows burning of tokens exceeding the balance.

findings.title: transferFrom
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: permit
findings.description: The 'permit' function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: Mint Function Vulnerability
findings.description: The mint function has been marked as vulnerable.

findings.title: Burn Amount Exceeds Balance
findings.description: In the _beforeTokenTransfer function, subtracting the burn amount from the balance without proper checks can cause the balance to go below zero.

findings.title: Unprotected swap functions
findings.description: Multiple unprotected swap functions were found, which can lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Skim
findings.description: The skim function has a security vulnerability.

findings.title: Unprotected sync function
findings.description: The sync function is not protected against reentrancy attacks.

findings.title: Uninitialized Variables
findings.description: The constructor does not initialize state variables.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: External function allowing removal of liquidity with ETH support for fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: removeLiquidityETHWithPermitSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to supporting fee-on-transfer tokens

findings.title: swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability in swapExactTokensForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens function due to fee-on-transfer tokens.

findings.title: swapExactETHForTokensSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to fee-on-transfer tokens support in swapExactETHForTokens function.

findings.title: swapExactTokensForETHSupportingFeeOnTransferTokens
findings.description: Potential vulnerability due to supporting fee on transfer tokens in swapExactTokensForETH function.

findings.title: <Constructor>
findings.description: The constructor function has public access and does not have any access modifiers like onlyOwner.

findings.title: Receive Ether
findings.description: The smart contract has a receive ether function which can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: distributeDividends
findings.description: N/A

findings.title: buyTokens
findings.description: No description provided.

findings.title: withdrawDividend
findings.description: External function allowing users to withdraw their dividends.

findings.title: _withdrawDividendOfUser
findings.description: Potential security vulnerability in _withdrawDividendOfUser function.

findings.title: _increase
findings.description: Potential reentrancy vulnerability or unsecured increment operation.

findings.title: _reduce
findings.description: Potential underflow/overflow vulnerability due to incorrect arithmetic operation.

findings.title: _setBalance
findings.description: Potential unauthorized access to set balance functionality due to onlyOwner restriction.
